Title: The Booty Bay Journal
Description:
You will not believe who I read about today in the Booty Bay Journal. What is that look, $p? I too enjoy light reading about world affairs. Booty Bay is fascinating!

Regardless, I read about Zeros--he was once the captive of an evil mage who hated all blue dragons. He seems to have found his own way in the world since his rescue.

A bit of advice for you, young one. Debt is a foolish thing to be in, especially in Booty Bay, and especially to the Baron.

Let's retrieve him before the sharks do.
ObjectivesText: Speak to Senegos to temporarily neutralize your standing with Booty Bay, and then find Zeros in Booty Bay in the Eastern Kingdoms.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Zeros in Booty Bay.

Objectives.Text: Read about Zeros in Senegos' Magical Tome
Take the portal from Azure Archives to Booty Bay
Speak to Senegos to neutralize your standing with Booty Bay
